Professional_Profile.Name: IIker Yoru
Professional_Profile.Summary: A dedicated Full-Stack Developer and Data Engineer with a strong background in Computer Engineering and Economics. Experienced in architecting high-performance websites, developing machine learning models, and optimizing user experiences. Skilled in a variety of technologies including React.js, Django, Python, SQL, and more.

Responsibilities: Architected and sustained high-performance websites using React.js, Django, PHP, and SQL.
Directed migration to AWS Cloud Services, improving system performance across 500+ branches.
Implemented advanced features in ongoing projects using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Django.
Optimized website performance, leading to a 30% increase in site traffic.
Engineered data extraction tools with Selenium for over 40,000 product entries.
Refined and prepared data for machine learning applications.
Spearheaded the creation and launch of the company's website.
Developed frontend interfaces using Flutter and Dart.
Integrated Backend API services using Dart.
Managed email communications through Amazon Simple Email Services.
Contributed to scaling the startup to handle 90 million transactions.
Developed and debugged software solutions for Makpro.
Implemented data filtering and storage processes using React.js and Redux.js.
Collaborated on cross-functional teams to resolve system issues.
Contributed to software design and problem resolution.
Drove top-three rankings across 30 domains.
Elevated monthly revenue through strategic SEO optimizations.
Optimized website architecture and content for better user experience.
Expanded digital marketing reach for e-learning platforms.

Freelance Projects.Description: Developed an e-commerce platform integrated into the payment system, leading to a 20% increase in sales.
Designed and implemented user interface using WordPress for improved visual appeal.
Crafted a high-performance e-commerce platform with WordPress tools, enhancing user experience.

Voluntary_Work.Position: Leader of Event and Social Responsibility Committee
Responsibilities: Coordinated educational seminars and workshops.
Directed community outreach programs.
Managed projects integrating scientific research with social impact.
Organized technical workshops and seminars.
Led strategic planning of major events.
Contributed to increased club membership.
Led COMP132 sessions in Java.
Supervised and evaluated projects and labs.
Mentored students in coding.

Voluntary_Work.Organization: Kog University Society of Women Engineers
Responsibilities: Led coding course for high school students.
Utilized platforms for hands-on learning experiences.
Conducted interactive lectures and practical sessions.

Skills_Gap_Analysis.Actions_Needed: To bridge the skills gap, IIker should consider taking courses or certifications in Blockchain Development, Cybersecurity, Big Data Analytics, Artificial Intelligence, and IoT Development to further enhance expertise and career opportunities.
